trans-unit.source: Represents a single tab page in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl"></xref>.
TabPage controls represent the tabbed pages in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> control.
The order of tab pages in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection reflects the order of tabs in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> control.
trans-unit.target: 탭 페이지의 순서는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>탭의 순서를 반영 하는 컬렉션의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To change the order of tabs in the control, you must change their positions in the collection by removing them and inserting them at new indexes.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤의 탭 순서를 변경 하려면을 제거 하 고 새 인덱스에 삽입 하 여 컬렉션에서의 위치를 변경 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: TabPage controls are constrained by their container, so some of the properties inherited from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> base class will have no effect, including <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A>.
trans-unit.target: TabPage 컨트롤의 컨테이너에 의해 제한 되므로에서 상속 된 속성 중 일부는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>기본 클래스는 아무런 영향이 없습니다 포함 하 여 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: The tabs in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> are part of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> but not parts of the individual TabPage controls.
trans-unit.target: 에 있는 탭에는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>의 일부인는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>하지만 개별 TabPage 컨트롤의 일부가 아니라.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: Members of the TabPage class, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> property, affect only the client rectangle of the tab page, but not the tabs.
trans-unit.target: TabPage의 멤버와 같은 클래스는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>속성 탭이 아니라 탭 페이지의 클라이언트 영역에만 영향을 줄.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A> method of the TabPage will not hide the tab.
To hide the tab, you must remove the TabPage control from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: TabPage 컨트롤을 제거 해야 탭을 숨기려면는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>컬렉션.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the tab is considered part of the tab page for determining when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the TabPage occur.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >에서 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], 탭 시기 결정 하기 위한 탭 페이지의 일부분 이라고 합니다.는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>는 TabPage의 이벤트가 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions of the .NET Framework, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the TabPage do not occur when focus enters or leaves a tab, but only when focus enters or leaves the client rectangle of the tab page.
trans-unit.target: 이전 버전의.NET Framework는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>는 TabPage의 이벤트가 발생 하지 않습니다 있지만 포커스 들어가거나 나올 때 탭을 포커스 모드로 들어가거나 나올 클라이언트 사각형 탭 페이지의 경우에.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how this control responds to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> methods, see the following <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> members: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanFocus%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanSelect%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focused%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContainsFocus%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 이 컨트롤에 응답 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>메서드를 다음을 참조 하십시오. <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>멤버: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanFocus%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanSelect%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focused%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContainsFocus%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContainsFocus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focused%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanSelect%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanFocus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Controls contained in a TabPage are not created until the tab page is shown, and any data bindings in these controls are not activated until the tab page is shown.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >는 TabPage에 포함 된 컨트롤 탭 페이지가 표시 되 고 이러한 컨트롤의 데이터 바인딩은 탭 페이지가 표시 될 때까지 활성화 되지 않으면 될 때까지 만들어지지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> property lets you indicate whether the background of the tab page should render using the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>속성을 사용 하면 현재 비주얼 스타일을 사용 하 여 탭 페이지의 배경 렌더링 해야 하는지 여부를 나타낼 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: This occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property values are both `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>.
trans-unit.target: 만 이럴 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성 값이 모두 `true` 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>속성 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> 부모는</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the background is painted normally.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref> class and specifies the text for the tab.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"> </xref> 클래스 및 탭에 대 한 텍스트를 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text%2A> property is set to the value of the `text` parameter.
The text for the tab.
This member is not meaningful for this control.
An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles"></xref> value.
This property is not meaningful for this control.
The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize*> property changes.

Although you can change the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize%2A> property and handle this event to determine when the value changes, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize%2A> property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 값을 변경할 수 있지만 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize%2A>속성 값 변경 되는 경우를 확인 하려면이 이벤트를 처리 하 고는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize%2A>속성은이 컨트롤에 의미가 없습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
This property is not meaningful for this control.
The control grows as much as necessary to fit its contents but does not shrink smaller than the value of its size property
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤이 해당 내용에 맞게 필요에 따라 증가 하지만 크기 속성의 값 보다 작게 축소할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 배경색을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value of the BackColor property is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property values are both `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> has a value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>, in which case the default value of the BackColor property is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: BackColor 속성의 기본값은 값의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성 경우가 아니면는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성 값이 모두 `true` 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>속성의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>값이 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>있는 경우 BackColor 속성의 기본값은 <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A> ,</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> 부모에</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Child controls that you place on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> inherit the BackColor value by default, so this behavior causes the background of the child controls to render with the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 에 배치 하는 자식 컨트롤의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>이 인해 자식의 배경을 컨트롤을 렌더링 현재 비주얼 스타일을 사용 하므로 기본적으로 BackColor 값을 상속 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: Changing the value of the BackColor property automatically sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 설정 BackColor 속성 값을 자동으로 변경 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>속성을 `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> background to render using visual styles but you want the child controls to inherit a BackColor value that you specify, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> property after you set the BackColor property.
trans-unit.target: 원하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>배경을 있지만 비주얼 스타일을 사용 하 여 렌더링에 원하는 자식 컨트롤을 지정 하는 속성 값을 상속 설정는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>속성 BackColor 속성을 설정한 후.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the background color of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> 의 배경색을 나타내는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the control collection for the control.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤에 대 한 컨트롤 컬렉션의 새 인스턴스를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> assigned to the control.
This member is not meaningful for this control.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref> value.
Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Dock*> property changes.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Dock%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the DockChanged event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Dock%2A>DockChanged 이벤트 변경을 감지 하 여를 처리 하 고 해당 값을 변경할 수는 있지만 속성은이 컨트롤에 의미가 없습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Dock%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
This member is not meaningful for this control.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Enabled*> property changes.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Enabled%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the EnabledChanged event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Enabled%2A>값을 변경 하 고 변경 내용을 검색 하려면 EnabledChanged 이벤트를 처리할 수 있지만 속성은이 컨트롤에 의미가 없습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Retrieves the tab page that contains the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 개체가 포함 된 탭 페이지를 검색 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The object to look for.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref> that contains the specified object, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the object cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"> </xref> 지정된 개체가 포함 된 또는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> 개체를 찾을 수 없는 경우.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index to the image displayed on this tab.
trans-unit.target: 이 탭에 표시 되는 이미지에 인덱스를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The ImageIndex points to an image in the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>.
The zero-based index to the image in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList%2A?displayProperty=fullName> that appears on the tab.
trans-unit.target: 이미지의&0;부터 시작 인덱스는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 탭에 표시 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, which signifies no image.
The ImageIndex value is less than -1.
Gets or sets the key accessor for the image in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList*> of the associated <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이미지에 대 한 키 접근자를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList*>관련 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList*>

trans-unit.source: The ImageKey property specifies the image from the image list to display on the control.
trans-unit.target: ImageKey 속성 컨트롤에 표시할 이미지 목록에서 이미지를 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A string representing the key of the image.
This property is not meaningful for this control.
The x and y coordinates which specifies the location of the object.
trans-unit.target: X 및 y 좌표는 개체의 위치를 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location*> property changes.

Although you can change the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location%2A> property and handle this event to determine when the value changes, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location%2A> property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 값을 변경할 수 있지만 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location%2A>속성 값 변경 되는 경우를 확인 하려면이 이벤트를 처리 하 고는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location%2A>속성은이 컨트롤에 의미가 없습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
This property is not meaningful for this control.
The upper limit of the size of the objet.
This property is not meaningful for this control.
The lower limit of the size of the objet.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref>.

In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the tab is considered part of the tab page for determining when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> occur.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], 탭에 시기 결정 하기 위한 탭 페이지의 일부로 간주 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>의 이벤트는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>발생.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions of the .NET Framework, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> do not occur when focus enters or leaves a tab, but only when focus enters or leaves the client rectangle of the tab page.
trans-unit.target: 이전 버전의.NET Framework는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>의 이벤트는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>포커스 모드로 들어가거나 나올 클라이언트 사각형 탭 페이지의 경우에 있지만 포커스 들어가거나 나올 때 탭 문자인을 발생 하지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 발생 시키는 대리자를 통해 이벤트 처리기를 호출 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The OnEnter method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnEnter 메서드는 파생된 클래스가 대리자를 연결 하지 않고도 이벤트를 처리할를 수도 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 이 파생된 클래스에서 이벤트를 처리 하는 기본 방법입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref>.

In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the tab is considered part of the tab page for determining when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> occur.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], 탭에 시기 결정 하기 위한 탭 페이지의 일부로 간주 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>의 이벤트는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>발생.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions of the .NET Framework, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> do not occur when focus enters or leaves a tab, but only when focus enters or leaves the client rectangle of the tab page.
trans-unit.target: 이전 버전의.NET Framework는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>의 이벤트는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>포커스 모드로 들어가거나 나올 클라이언트 사각형 탭 페이지의 경우에 있지만 포커스 들어가거나 나올 때 탭 문자인을 발생 하지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 발생 시키는 대리자를 통해 이벤트 처리기를 호출 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The OnLeave method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnLeave 메서드는 파생된 클래스가 대리자를 연결 하지 않고도 이벤트를 처리할를 수도 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 이 파생된 클래스에서 이벤트를 처리 하는 기본 방법입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
Paints the background of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref>.
The system calls this method to paint the background of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.
trans-unit.target: 시스템 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> 의 배경을 칠하는 데이 메서드를 호출 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property values are both `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>, this method paints the background using the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성 값이 모두 `true` 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>부모 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>,이 메서드는 현재 비주얼 스타일을 사용 하 여 배경을 그립니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method paints the background as usual.
trans-unit.target: 그렇지 않으면이 메서드는 일반적으로 배경을 그립니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains data useful for painting the background.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref> 배경을 그리는 데 유용한 데이터를 포함 하 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for this control.
The size of a rectangular area into which the control can fit.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤이 들어갈 수 있는 사각형 영역의 크기입니다.

trans-unit.source: This member overrides <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*> property value of the control.
The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*> property value of the control.
The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*> property value of the control.
The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*> property value of the control.
A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref> values.
This property is not meaningful for this control.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property indicates the order in which controls receive focus as a user presses the TAB key on a form.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성은 컨트롤이 포커스를 받는 폼에서 TAB 키를 누를 때 순서를 나타냅니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> controls are contained within <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> controls, however, and do not receive focus individually as part of the form's TAB order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>그러나 컨트롤 내에 포함 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>제어 포커스 폼의 탭 순서의 일환으로 개별적으로 받지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: This property is therefore meaningless for this class.
trans-unit.target: 따라서이 속성은이 클래스에 대 한 의미가 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: The tab order of the control.
Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabIndex*> property changes.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabIndex%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the TabIndexChanged event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabIndex%2A>TabIndexChanged 이벤트 변경을 감지 하 여를 처리 하 고 해당 값을 변경할 수는 있지만 속성은이 컨트롤에 의미가 없습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
This member is not meaningful for this control.
<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> controls are contained within <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> controls and do not receive focus individually as part of the form's TAB order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>컨트롤 내에 포함 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>컨트롤 및 폼의 탭 순서의 일환으로 포커스를 개별적으로 수신지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: This property is therefore meaningless for this class.
trans-unit.target: 따라서이 속성은이 클래스에 대 한 의미가 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabStop*> property changes.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabStop%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the TabStopChanged event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabStop%2A>TabStopChanged 이벤트 변경을 감지 하 여를 처리 하 고 해당 값을 변경할 수는 있지만 속성은이 컨트롤에 의미가 없습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabStop%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Gets or sets the text to display on the tab.
trans-unit.target: 탭에 표시할 텍스트를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Changing the Text property value does not automatically center the new value on the tab if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SizeMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabSizeMode>.
trans-unit.target: Text 속성 값을 변경 가운데 있지 않은 자동으로 탭에서 새 값 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SizeMode%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabSizeMode>안내 하십시오.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabSizeMode> 속성 값</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: You can work around this limitation by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ItemSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property or by removing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection and adding it back to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하 여이 제한을 해결할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ItemSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성 또는 제거 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>컬렉션에 추가 하 고 다시 컬렉션에.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ItemSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Both of these actions will automatically center the text.
trans-unit.target: 두이 작업은 텍스트를 자동으로 가운데 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the tab.
Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Text*> property changes.
To be added.
Gets or sets the ToolTip text for this tab.
trans-unit.target: 이 탭에 대 한 도구 설명 텍스트를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This tab page belongs to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>.
The ToolTip text appears when the user moves the mouse over the tab if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ShowToolTips%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 도구 설명 텍스트가 표시 되는 경우 사용자의 탭 위로 마우스를 움직일 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ShowToolTips%2A>속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>은 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ShowToolTips%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about ToolTips, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> class.
trans-unit.target: 도구 설명에 대 한 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>클래스</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> 를 참조 하십시오.

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip text for this tab.
trans-unit.target: 이 탭에 대 한 도구 설명 텍스트입니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string containing the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text*> property.
A string containing the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text*> property.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref> background renders using the current visual style when visual styles are enabled.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 여부는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"> </xref> 백그라운드 비주얼 스타일을 사용 하는 경우 현재 비주얼 스타일을 사용 하 여 렌더링 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> background uses the current visual style only when the UseVisualStyleBackColor and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property values are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>배경 현재 비주얼 스타일을 사용 하 여 경우에만 UseVisualStyleBackColor 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성 값이 모두 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: When the UseVisualStyleBackColor and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property values are both `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>, the default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> property is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 UseVisualStyleBackColor 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성 값이 모두 `true` 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>속성의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A>속성은 <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> 의 기본값</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance> 은</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> 부모는</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Child controls that you place on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> inherit the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> value by default, so this behavior causes the background of the child controls to render with the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 에 배치 하는 자식 컨트롤의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>상속는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A>기본적으로이 인해 자식의 배경을 컨트롤을 렌더링 현재 비주얼 스타일을 사용 하므로 값.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: Changing the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> property automatically sets the UseVisualStyleBackColor property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 값을 변경는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A>속성 UseVisualStyleBackColor 속성을 자동으로 설정 `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> background to render using visual styles but you want the child controls to inherit a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> value that you specify, set the UseVisualStyleBackColor property after you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 원하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>있지만 비주얼 스타일을 사용 하 여 렌더링 하는 배경 상속 하도록 자식 컨트롤을 원하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A>지정 하는 값을 설정한 후 UseVisualStyleBackColor 속성을 설정는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to render the background using the current visual style; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>현재 비주얼 스타일;를 사용 하 여 배경을 렌더링 하려면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
This member is not meaningful for this control.
This member is not meaningful for this control.
To hide a tab in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, you must remove it from the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A> collection.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Visible*> property changes.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Visible%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the VisibleChanged event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Visible%2A>VisibleChanged 이벤트 변경을 감지 하 여를 처리 하 고 해당 값을 변경할 수는 있지만 속성은이 컨트롤에 의미가 없습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: To hide a tab in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, you must remove it from the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A> collection.
To be added.
